A new adventure awaits as the goddess of #b#m200000000##k must be rescued! At the very top of Orbis Tower stands a newly-built Tower of Minerva the Goddess... and inside that tower, #b#p2013002##k lays trapped, awaiting a helping hand. 
To do so, the mission is to clear Stage 1 to enter the tower, enter Stage 2, clear 6 Mysterious Rooms in the tower, and restore the broken statue of goddess. Can the group survive Stage 3, where #r#o9300039##k awaits, and rescue the goddess? 

 - #eTime Limit#n : 60 min
 - #eParticipants#n : 6
 - #eRewards#n : #b#i01082232# #t01082232##k
 (Gather up 40 Goddess Feathers,
 and win over Wonky the Fairy
 to acquire the Goddess Wristband)

Join forces to defeat #r#o9300039##k and rescue #b#p2013002##k! Take #r40#k #b#t04001158#s#k to #b#p2013000##k to acquire #b#t01082232##k. But, we must win over #p2013000# as well.

#eSummary#n
A new adventure awaits as the goddess of #b#m200000000##k must be rescued! At the very top of Orbis Tower stands a newly-built Tower of Minerva the Goddess... and inside that tower, #b#p2013002##k lays trapped, awaiting a helping hand. 
To do so, the mission is to clear Stage 1 to enter the tower, enter Stage 2, clear 6 Mysterious Rooms in the tower, and restore the broken statue of goddess. Can the group survive Stage 3, where #r#o9300039##k awaits, and rescue the goddess?

My comrades and I make a vow to stay strong and bonded as we head towards the Tower of Goddess to face a whole new adventure and adversity.
